name: verify-user.ts
description: Responsible for sending OTPs and password logins.

description: Responsible for validating OTP and preventing misuse of Identity Platform.

description: Handles JWT refreshes every hour.

description: Restarts typesense document indexer if in case it crashes.

name: indexer.ts
description: Resposible for backfill data into typesense, listens supabase continously.

name: pdf-server.js
description: Responsible for Server Side Invoice Rendering

description: Manages razorpay payments and app subscriptions.

name: control-centre-server.ts
description: Powers this control centre.

name: store-server.ts
description: Handles order checkout and product requests coming from online store

name: sms-and-maps-server.js
description: Serves multiple functions: fetches geographical distance using ola maps, sends otp, send online order notification to host shop and auto-adds logged in users to BillingFast.

name: integrity-server.js
description: Prevents bot attacks does evaluation on various parameters.

name: stock-server.js
description: Handles stock transfer requests.

name: dashboard_server.js
description: Servers complete business tally.

name: summary-server.js
description: Handles ledger calculations.

name: order-pooling-server.js
description: Prevents duplicate invoices and manages concurrency.

name: gsp-server.js
description: Serves details by GSTIN number.

name: reports-server.js
description: Responsible for providing all sorts of reports in the app.

description: Handles all AI features.

description: Provides this health stat.
